detail_desc: Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Bikini briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, two elastic straps at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
CONSCIOUS. 5-pocket washed denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a regular waist and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Knitted jacket with a soft fleece lining, hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Trousers in a sturdy linen and cotton blend with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and tapered legs.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Top in soft, airy modal jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 3 cm.

V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a wrapover front and concealed press-stud at the top. Long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs, and an opening with ties at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with ties at the back of the neck, padded cups with removable inserts and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Short skirt in several layers of tulle with sequins and an elasticated waist containing glittery threads. Lined.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front, a glittery peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Wide, boxy bomber jacket in nylon with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket and a ribbed hem. Lined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button, and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt at the front, belt loops with a decorative button, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Wrapover body in soft organic cotton jersey and velour trousers in a cotton blend. Body with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Narrow-striped shorts in a crinkled weave with a regular waist with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.7 cm, total length 21.5 cm. Diameter of watch 3.2 cm.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems, and a skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.

Shirt in a silk and cotton weave with a collar and V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist with pleats for added volume at the top, and a gently rounded hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and detachable tie belt under the bust. Small frill trim around the neckline and armholes.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Metal chain necklace with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Gathers and elastication in the side seams for best fit.
Bucket hat in soft, felted wool. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Twill tuxedo designed to fit a small dog. Contrasting colour shirt front with a collar and hook and loop fastening, and a bow tie and shawl collar at the top. Sleeves at the front. Length excluding collar approx. 31 cm. Lined.
Straight-cut nightslip in soft cotton jersey with a flock print text motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Straight-cut hem and slits in the sides.
Cardigan in a soft knit with wide lapels, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and front pockets.
Purse in quilted imitation leather with a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Eight card slots, two note compartments and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x20 cm.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a high waist, buttons down the front and shaping darts at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Trainers in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, diagonal pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
3/4-length leggings in ribbed jersey with wide elastication at the waist.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front with a chin guard, a fake flap pocket on the tummy, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining.
Short, A-line skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side.

Shorts in stretch cotton twill. High waist with tabs and metal D-rings at the front and a concealed zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Relaxed fit with pleats at the top of the front and side pockets.

Short, padded jacket with a stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Side pockets with press-studs, two inner pockets, raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with reflective details and elasticated cuffs. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short, gently fitted dress in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the hems, and a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a blouse and pair of leggings in cotton. Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs. Jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front. Double-layered, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in an airy, spot-print viscose weave with a concealed zip at the back of the neck and shoulder pads. Long sleeves with ties at the cuffs and a frilled drawstring at the front. Unlined.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and a chest pocket.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Long, wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with soft elastication at the waist.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a rib-knit turtle neck, long raglan sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 6 cm.
Short skirt in satin with a sheen. Wrapover buttoning at the front. Lined.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Three printed and two in a solid colour.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton blend with terry hearts. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted V-neck blouse in a patterned weave with decorative lacing at the front, long puff sleeves, a concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. One pair decorated with rhinestones and one pair with plastic beads.
Short dress in sturdy cotton with wide shoulder straps, decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lacing at the sides.

5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a zip fly and button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Short fitted top in ribbed jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cotton jersey vest tops in various designs with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Two with a chest pocket.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and elasticated hems.
Pyjama shorts in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and lace-trimmed hems.
